subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The mutual distaste between the American and Argentine men’s basketball teams manifested itself with shoves, elbows and heated exchanges, and the United States won to clinch its group’s top seed.
snippet: The mutual distaste between the American and Argentine men’s basketball teams manifested itself with shoves, elbows and heated exchanges, and the United States won to clinch its group’s top seed.
